    trigger                 gg_trg_ChooseLevel         = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior1 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior2 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior3 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior4 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior5 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior6 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior7 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourWarrior8 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolourDwarfTown = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolounBowman1 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolounBowman2 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_randomcolounBowman3 = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_LightUnitDies       = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_Cinematic           = null
    trigger                 gg_trg_Initializing        = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n009_0023          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_u002_0017          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n008_0022          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n008_0002          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n009_0004          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n008_0005          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n009_0006          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n008_0007          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n009_0008          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n002_0025          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n00A_0001          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n00B_0003          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nshe_0009          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nshe_0026          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nshe_0027          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nshe_0029          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n002_0030          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n003_0034          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n006_0032          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_n004_0033          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0031          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0035          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0036          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0037          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0038          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0039          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0040          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0041          = null
    unit                    gg_unit_nfro_0042          = null
endglobals

function InitGlobals takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i = 0
    set udg_RandomNumberSound1 = 0
    set udg_RandomNumberSound2 = 0
    set udg_FacinAngle = 0
    set udg_IntegerMine = 0
    set udg_RandomColourLight1 = 0
    set udg_RandomColourLight2 = 0
    set udg_RandomColourLight3 = 0
    set udg_RandomColourLight4 = 0
    set udg_RNcolourLight = 0
    set udg_UGLightGroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_DialogLevel = DialogCreate()
    set udg_BoleanDificulty1 = false
    set udg_BoleanDificulty3 = false
    set udg_BoleanDificulty2 = false
    set udg_BooleanLightDies = false
    set udg_UGLastZombies = CreateGroup()
    set udg_BoleanLastZombies = false
    set udg_BoleanQuestCasualty = false
    set udg_UDex = 0
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_UnitIndexLock[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_UDexPrev[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_UDexNext[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_UnitIndexEvent = 0
    set udg_UDexRecycle = 0
    set udg_UnitIndexerEnabled = false
    set udg_UDexWasted = 0
    set udg_UDexGen = 0
    set udg_DamageTypeExplosive = 0
    set udg_DamageTypeCriticalStrike = 0
    set udg_DamageTypeHeal = 0
    set udg_DamageTypeReduced = 0
    set udg_DamageTypeBlocked = 0
    set udg_DAMAGE_FACTOR_BRACERS = 0
    set udg_DAMAGE_FACTOR_ELUNES = 0
    set udg_DAMAGE_FACTOR_ETHEREAL = 0
    set udg_DamageEventAOE = 0
    set udg_DamageEventLevel = 0
    set udg_AfterDamageEvent = 0
    set udg_DamageEvent = 0
    set udg_AOEDamageEvent = 0
    set udg_DamageModifierEvent = 0
    set udg_DamageEventAmount = 0
    set udg_DamageEventPrevAmt = 0
    set udg_DamageEventOverride = false
    set udg_NextDamageOverride = false
    set udg_DamageEventType = 0
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_LastDmgPrevType[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_NextDamageType = 0
    set udg_DamageEventsWasted = 0
    set udg_DmgEvRecursionN = 0
    set udg_DmgEvRunning = false
    set udg_DmgEvStarted = false
    set udg_IsDamageSpell = false
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_LastDmgWasSpell[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_LastDamageHP = 0
    set udg_DmgEvTimer = CreateTimer()
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_LastDmgPrevAmount[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_LastDmgValue[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_HideDamageFrom[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_UnitDamageRegistered[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_DamageEventAOEGroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_IntegerFlameArrow = 0
    set udg_LigthGroup = CreateGroup()
    set udg_RandomNumberSound3 = 0
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Destructible Item Tables
//*
//***************************************************************************

function Doodad000618_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I002', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function Doodad000746_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I002', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

function Doodad002902_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget  trigWidget = null
    local unit    trigUnit   = null
    local integer itemID     = 0
    local boolean canDrop    = true

    set trigWidget = bj_lastDyingWidget
    if (trigWidget == null) then
        set trigUnit = GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if (trigUnit != null) then
        set canDrop = not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if (canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null) then
            set canDrop = (GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
        endif
    endif

    if (canDrop) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset(  )
        call RandomDistAddItem( 'I002', 100 )
        set itemID = RandomDistChoose(  )
        if (trigUnit != null) then
            call UnitDropItem( trigUnit, itemID )
        else
            call WidgetDropItem( trigWidget, itemID )
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget = null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction


//***************************************************************************

//*  Sound Assets
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitSounds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_snd_Briefing = "war3mapImported/Briefing.mp3"
    set gg_snd_Archerbattle0 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Archerbattle0.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Archerbattle0, 1674 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Archerbattle0, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Archerbattle0, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Archerbattle0, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Archerbattle1 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Archerbattle1.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Archerbattle1, 1044 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Archerbattle1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Archerbattle1, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Archerbattle1, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Archerbattle2 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Archerbattle2.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Archerbattle2, 1328 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Archerbattle2, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Archerbattle2, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Archerbattle2, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Swordmanbattle2 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Swordmanbattle2.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle2, 1507 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle2, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle2, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle2, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Swordmanbattle3 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Swordmanbattle3.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle3, 1055 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle3, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle3, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle3, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Swordmanbattle4 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Swordmanbattle4.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle4, 1282 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle4, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle4, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Swordmanbattle4, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Myth_2_Soulblighter___Victory_Them = "war3mapImported/Myth 2 Soulblighter   Victory Them.mp3"
    set gg_snd_Myth_2_Soulblighter__Salvation = "war3mapImported/Myth 2 Soulblighter (Salvation.mp3"
    set gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle0 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Crossbowmanbattle0.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle0, 1250 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle0, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle0, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle0, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle2 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Crossbowmanbattle2.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle2, 1363 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle2, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle2, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle2, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle1 = CreateSound( "war3mapImported/Crossbowmanbattle1.wav", false, false, false, 1, 1, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle1, 667 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle1, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle1, 1.0 )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Destructable Objects
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateAllDestructables takes nothing returns nothing
    local destructable d
    local trigger t
    local real life
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'LTcr', 2368.0, -1728.0, 0.000, 0.800, 1, 'LTcr' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function Doodad000746_DropItems )
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'LTcr', -640.0, -2624.0, 97.000, 0.800, 0, 'LTcr' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function Doodad002899_DropItems )
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'LTcr', 5376.0, -8448.0, 0.000, 0.800, 0, 'LTcr' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function Doodad002900_DropItems )
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'LTcr', 2496.0, -7424.0, 0.000, 0.800, 1, 'LTcr' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function Doodad002901_DropItems )
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'LTcr', 5184.0, -5504.0, 0.000, 0.800, 1, 'LTcr' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function Doodad002902_DropItems )
    set d = BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin( 'LTcr', 704.0, -4736.0, 0.000, 0.800, 0, 'LTcr' )
    set t = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent( t, d )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function SaveDyingWidget )
    call TriggerAddAction( t, function Doodad000618_DropItems )
endfunction

    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_u002_0017 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'u002', 6926.8, -9946.8, 90.000, 'u002' )
endfunction

    set gg_unit_n004_0033 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n004', 3097.3, -2245.2, 175.303, 'n004' )

    set gg_unit_n00A_0001 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n00A', 5728.0, -8160.0, 270.000, 'n00A' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralPassive takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_n00B_0003 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n00B', 5659.7, -8467.1, 283.845, 'n00B' )
    set gg_unit_nshe_0009 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nshe', 5754.2, -5871.5, 2.230, 'nshe' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', 6423.1, -3868.1, 4.175, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', 6560.7, -4014.1, 199.869, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', 6397.5, -4044.9, 16.711, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', 6483.0, -3566.7, 254.748, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', 6389.4, -3347.1, 268.745, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', 6676.6, -3374.8, 322.700, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', 6692.8, -3633.1, 313.296, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', -1741.3, -4811.4, 308.703, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', -1749.2, -4880.5, 340.312, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', -1514.2, -4924.1, 8.031, 'npig' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'npig', -1585.5, -4784.1, 215.778, 'npig' )
    set gg_unit_nshe_0026 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nshe', 5539.5, -5867.0, 151.660, 'nshe' )
    set gg_unit_nshe_0027 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nshe', 5508.6, -6003.2, 178.412, 'nshe' )
    set gg_unit_nshe_0029 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nshe', 5700.7, -6083.5, 210.988, 'nshe' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0031 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', 4504.8, -8664.2, 30.038, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0035 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', 4824.9, -8665.6, 242.003, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0036 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', 3993.6, -8554.9, 154.440, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0037 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', 3118.3, -8547.0, 42.507, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0038 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', 1892.3, -8523.6, 111.603, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0039 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', 840.2, -8444.9, 188.498, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0040 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', -1379.4, -7069.7, 10.492, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0041 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', -636.7, -7246.8, 16.557, 'nfro' )
    set gg_unit_nfro_0042 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nfro', -2495.6, -6922.9, 286.521, 'nfro' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'necr', -1931.9, -6541.7, 347.728, 'necr' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'necr', 3488.1, -6641.0, 7.174, 'necr' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'necr', 5488.1, -1609.2, 230.456, 'necr' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'necr', -870.1, -74.6, 82.521, 'necr' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'necr', -2609.5, -2641.9, 82.477, 'necr' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'necr', 5649.7, -7302.9, 284.313, 'necr' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer8(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer9(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer20(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateAllUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNeutralPassiveBuildings(  )
    call CreatePlayerBuildings(  )
    call CreateNeutralPassive(  )
    call CreatePlayerUnits(  )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Regions
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateRegions takes nothing returns nothing
    local weathereffect we

    set gg_rct_Warrior1 = Rect( -4512.0, -8704.0, -4416.0, -8608.0 )
    set gg_rct_Warrior2 = Rect( -4416.0, -8704.0, -4320.0, -8608.0 )
    set gg_rct_Warrior3 = Rect( -4224.0, -8704.0, -4128.0, -8608.0 )
    set gg_rct_Warrior4 = Rect( -4512.0, -8800.0, -4416.0, -8704.0 )
    set gg_rct_Warrior5 = Rect( -4416.0, -8800.0, -4320.0, -8704.0 )
    set gg_rct_Warrior6 = Rect( -4320.0, -8800.0, -4224.0, -8704.0 )
    set gg_rct_Warrior7 = Rect( -4224.0, -8800.0, -4128.0, -8704.0 )
    set gg_rct_Warrior8 = Rect( -4320.0, -8704.0, -4224.0, -8608.0 )
    set gg_rct_Bowman1 = Rect( -4160.0, -9024.0, -4064.0, -8928.0 )
    set gg_rct_Bowman2 = Rect( -4064.0, -9024.0, -3968.0, -8928.0 )
    set gg_rct_Bowman3 = Rect( -3968.0, -9024.0, -3872.0, -8928.0 )
    set gg_rct_Dwarf1 = Rect( -4768.0, -8992.0, -4672.0, -8896.0 )
    set gg_rct_Villager1 = Rect( 672.0, -2752.0, 768.0, -2656.0 )
    set gg_rct_Villager2 = Rect( 992.0, -2752.0, 1088.0, -2656.0 )
    set gg_rct_Villager3 = Rect( 2848.0, -4608.0, 2944.0, -4512.0 )
    set gg_rct_Villager4 = Rect( 2624.0, -4576.0, 2720.0, -4480.0 )
    set gg_rct_Region03 = Rect( -2400.0, -9024.0, -1216.0, 704.0 )
    set gg_rct_FAvillager1 = Rect( -3552.0, -4512.0, -3456.0, -4416.0 )
    set gg_rct_FAvillager2 = Rect( -3392.0, -5088.0, -3296.0, -4992.0 )

    set gg_rct_FirstPeasant2 = Rect( -4224.0, -9664.0, -3712.0, -9344.0 )
    set gg_rct_ZombieArea1 = Rect( 3904.0, -768.0, 5824.0, 864.0 )
    set gg_rct_ZombieArea2 = Rect( 4384.0, -4576.0, 5600.0, -3712.0 )

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Cameras
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateCameras takes nothing returns nothing

    set gg_cam_Camera_01 = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 64.4, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 328.1, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1272.3, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 90.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5400.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_01, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Camera_01, 1063.6, -2939.2, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Camera_02 = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 37.5, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 336.9, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1156.6, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 90.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5400.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_02, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Camera_02, 2788.3, -4639.8, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Camera_03 = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 109.5, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 324.6, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1539.5, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 90.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5400.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_03, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Camera_03, 3220.6, -3187.5, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Camera_04 = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 63.4, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 331.4, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1693.4, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 90.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5400.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_04, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Camera_04, 2860.6, -3164.3, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Camera_05 = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 85.2, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 325.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1128.9, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 90.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 4909.1, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_05, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Camera_05, -4330.2, -8939.3, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 89.1, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 333.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1272.3, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 90.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5400.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, 5718.4, -8380.0, 0.0 )

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Flaming Arrow 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityUnit() == udg_UnitBowman1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman1, 'I002')) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), 'I002') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman1, 'I002')) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_FA_Point = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_FA_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        set udg_FA_Point = GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attackground", udg_FA_Point )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        call SetItemCharges( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman1, 'I002'), ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman1, 'I002')) - 1 ) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_FA_Point = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_FA_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
            set udg_FA_Point = GetSpellTargetLoc()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attackground", udg_FA_Point )
            call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman1, 'I002') )
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00A', udg_UnitBowman1 )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Flaming_Arrow_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_1, Condition( function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_1, function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Flaming Arrow 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityUnit() == udg_UnitBowman2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman2, 'I002')) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), 'I002') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman2, 'I002')) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_FA_Point = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o003', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_FA_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        set udg_FA_Point = GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attackground", udg_FA_Point )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        call SetItemCharges( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman2, 'I002'), ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman2, 'I002')) - 1 ) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_FA_Point = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o003', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_FA_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
            set udg_FA_Point = GetSpellTargetLoc()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attackground", udg_FA_Point )
            call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman2, 'I002') )
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00A', udg_UnitBowman2 )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Flaming_Arrow_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_2, Condition( function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow_2, function Trig_Flaming_Arrow_2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Flaming Arrow3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityUnit() == udg_UnitBowman3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman3, 'I002')) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), 'I002') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman3, 'I002')) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_FA_Point = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o004', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_FA_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        set udg_FA_Point = GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attackground", udg_FA_Point )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        call SetItemCharges( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman3, 'I002'), ( GetItemCharges(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman3, 'I002')) - 1 ) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_FA_Point = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o004', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_FA_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
            set udg_FA_Point = GetSpellTargetLoc()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attackground", udg_FA_Point )
            call RemoveItem( GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(udg_UnitBowman3, 'I002') )
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00A', udg_UnitBowman3 )
            call RemoveLocation(udg_FA_Point)
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Flaming_Arrow3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow3, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow3, Condition( function Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Flaming_Arrow3, function Trig_Flaming_Arrow3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WarriorDamaged1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) == 'n008' )
endfunction

function Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Func002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) == 'n009' )
endfunction

function Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget == udg_UnitWarrior1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr( Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Func002001(), Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Func002002() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_UnitWarrior1, 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 4) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_DamageEventAmount = 0.00
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_UnitWarrior1, "defend" )
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ( "TRIGSTR_372", GetUnitLoc(udg_UnitWarrior1), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0 )
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ( GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90 )
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ( GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false )
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ( GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00 )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_UnitWarrior1, "undefend" )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o002', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetUnitLoc(udg_UnitWarrior1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_UnitWarrior1 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_UnitWarrior1 )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WarriorDamaged1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WarriorDamaged1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent( gg_trg_WarriorDamaged1, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_WarriorDamaged1, Condition( function Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_WarriorDamaged1, function Trig_WarriorDamaged1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WarriorDamaged2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WarriorDamaged2_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) == 'n008' )
endfunction

function Trig_WarriorDamaged2_Func002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) == 'n009' )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr( Trig_WarriorDamaged2_Func002001(), Trig_WarriorDamaged2_Func002002() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_UnitWarrior2, 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 4) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_UnitWarrior2, "defend" )
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ( "TRIGSTR_371", GetUnitLoc(udg_UnitWarrior2), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0 )
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ( GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90 )
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ( GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false )
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ( GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00 )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_UnitWarrior2, "undefend" )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o002', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetUnitLoc(udg_UnitWarrior2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_UnitWarrior2 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_UnitWarrior2 )
    endif
endfunction

function InitTrig_WarriorDamaged8 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WarriorDamaged8 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent( gg_trg_WarriorDamaged8, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_WarriorDamaged8, Condition( function Trig_WarriorDamaged8_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_WarriorDamaged8, function Trig_WarriorDamaged8_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GhastRemoveColdBonus
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'n008' )
endfunction

function Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Func002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'n009' )
endfunction

function Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr( Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Func002001(), Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Func002002() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GhastRemoveColdBonus takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GhastRemoveColdBonus = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_GhastRemoveColdBonus, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_GhastRemoveColdBonus, Condition( function Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_GhastRemoveColdBonus, function Trig_GhastRemoveColdBonus_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BowmanDamaged
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BowmanDamaged_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventTarget) == 'n000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o005' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'n008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'n009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'h001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'h002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BowmanDamaged_Func001Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) == 'n008' )
endfunction

function Trig_BowmanDamaged_Func001Func009002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) == 'n009' )
endfunction

function Trig_BowmanDamaged_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr( Trig_BowmanDamaged_Func001Func009001(), Trig_BowmanDamaged_Func001Func009002() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BowmanDamaged_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_BowmanDamaged_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_UnitBowman = udg_DamageEventTarget
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o002', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetUnitLoc(udg_UnitBowman), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_UnitBowman )
    else
        set udg_UnitBowman = udg_DamageEventTarget
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetUnitLoc(udg_UnitBowman), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_UnitBowman )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BowmanDamaged takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BowmanDamaged = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent( gg_trg_BowmanDamaged, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_BowmanDamaged, Condition( function Trig_BowmanDamaged_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_BowmanDamaged, function Trig_BowmanDamaged_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warrior Damaged general
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warrior_Damaged_general_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventTarget) == 'h000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o005' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'o004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'n008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'n009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'h001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventSource) != 'h002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warrior_Damaged_general_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UnitWarrior = udg_DamageEventTarget
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetUnitLoc(udg_UnitWarrior), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_UnitWarrior )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
