//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DwarfDrops
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DwarfDrops_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetManipulatingUnit()) == 'h001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetLastRemovedItem()) == 'I001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DwarfDrops_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I001') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DwarfDrops_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.01 )
    if ( Trig_DwarfDrops_Func002C() ) then
        call DoNothing(  )
    else
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00C', GetManipulatingUnit() )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DwarfDrops takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DwarfDrops = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_DwarfDrops, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DROP_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_DwarfDrops, Condition( function Trig_DwarfDrops_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_DwarfDrops, function Trig_DwarfDrops_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetManipulatingUnit()) == 'n000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetLastRemovedItem()) == 'I002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BowmanDrops_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I002') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_BowmanDrops_Func002C() ) then
        call DoNothing(  )
    else
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00A', GetManipulatingUnit() )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: killpig
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'npig' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_killpig_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_312" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_killpig takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_killpig = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_killpig, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_killpig, function Trig_killpig_Actions )

        return false
    endif
    return true

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FindFisherman
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FindFisherman_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FindFisherman_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupImmediateOrderBJ( udg_UGLightGroup, "stop" )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, gg_cam_Camera_Fisherman, Player(0), 1.00 )
    call CinematicModeBJ( true, GetPlayersAll() )
    call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUTIN, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(21), 'n00B', "TRIGSTR_288", GetRectCenter(GetEntireMapRect()), null, "TRIGSTR_289", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, true )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n00B_0003, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FishermanTakesWeapons) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FindFisherman takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FindFisherman = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple( gg_trg_FindFisherman, 500.00, gg_unit_n00B_0003 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_FindFisherman, Condition( function Trig_FindFisherman_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_FindFisherman, function Trig_FindFisherman_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FishermanTurnsArcher
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FishermanTurnsArcher_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n00B_0003 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FishermanTurnsArcher_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00C', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FishermanTakesWeapons), 200.00 )
    set udg_UnitCrossbowman1 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped( 'I005', udg_UnitCrossbowman1 )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLightGroup )
    call SetUnitColor( GetLastCreatedUnit(), PLAYER_COLOR_SNOW )
    call CinematicModeBJ( true, GetPlayersAll() )
    call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUTIN, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(21), 'n00C', "TRIGSTR_295", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FishermanTakesWeapons), gg_snd_Crossbowmanbattle2, "TRIGSTR_296", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, true )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CinematicModeBJ( false, GetPlayersAll() )
    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer( Player(0), 0 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( Player(0), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2000.00, 0 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( Player(0), CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 325.00, 0 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_COMPLETED, "TRIGSTR_297" )
    call QuestSetCompletedBJ( udg_QuestFisherman, true )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FishermanTurnsArcher takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FishermanTurnsArcher = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_FishermanTurnsArcher, gg_rct_FishermanTakesWeapons )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_FishermanTurnsArcher, Condition( function Trig_FishermanTurnsArcher_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_FishermanTurnsArcher, function Trig_FishermanTurnsArcher_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT1_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT1_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT1_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 175.00 )
    if ( Trig_ZOT1_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie15 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie16 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT1_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie15 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie16 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie17 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie18 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie19 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT1_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie15 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie16 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie17 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie18 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie19 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie110 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie111 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie112 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT1Moves )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie11, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie12, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie13, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie14, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie15, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie16, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie17, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie18, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie19, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie110, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie111, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie112, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT1, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT1, Condition( function Trig_ZOT1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT1, function Trig_ZOT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT1Moves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT1Moves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie11, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie12, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie13, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie14, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie15, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie16, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie17, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie18, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie19, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie110, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie111, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie112, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT1Moves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT1Moves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT1Moves )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT1Moves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT1Moves, function Trig_ZOT1Moves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT2_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT2_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT2_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 275.00 )
    if ( Trig_ZOT2_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie21 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie22 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie23 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie24 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie25 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie26 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT2_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie21 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie22 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie23 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie24 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie25 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie26 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie27 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie28 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie29 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT2_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie21 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie22 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie23 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie24 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie25 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie26 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie27 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie28 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie29 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie210 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie211 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie212 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie31, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie32, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie33, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie34, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie35, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie36, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie37, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie38, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie21, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie22, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie23, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie24, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie25, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie26, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie27, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie28, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie29, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie210, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie211, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie212, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZombiesTown3RandomMove )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT2Moves )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT2, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT2, Condition( function Trig_ZOT2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT2, function Trig_ZOT2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT2Moves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT2Moves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie31, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie32, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie33, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie34, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie35, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie36, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie37, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie38, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie21, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie22, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie23, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie24, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie25, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie26, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie27, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie28, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie29, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie210, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie211, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie212, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT2Moves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT2Moves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT2Moves )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT2Moves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT2Moves, function Trig_ZOT2Moves_Actions )
endfunction
