// Trigger: ZOT3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT3_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT3_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT3_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 375.00 )
    if ( Trig_ZOT3_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie31 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie32 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie33 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie34 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie35 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie36 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT3_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie31 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie32 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie33 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie34 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie35 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie36 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie37 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie38 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie39 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT3_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie31 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie32 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie33 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie34 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie35 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie36 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie37 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie38 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie39 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie310 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie311 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie312 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT3Moves )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZombiesTown5RandomMove )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie31, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie32, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie33, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie34, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie35, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie36, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie37, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie38, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie39, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie310, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie311, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie312, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie51, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie52, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie53, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie54, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie55, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie56, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie57, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie58, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT3, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT3, Condition( function Trig_ZOT3_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT3, function Trig_ZOT3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT3Moves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT3Moves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie31, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie32, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie33, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie34, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie35, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie36, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie37, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie38, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie39, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie310, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie311, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie312, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie51, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie52, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie53, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie54, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie55, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie56, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie57, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie58, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT3Moves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT3Moves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT3Moves )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT3Moves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT3Moves, function Trig_ZOT3Moves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT4_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT4_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT4_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 400.00 )
    if ( Trig_ZOT4_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie41 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie42 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie43 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie44 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie45 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie46 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT4_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie41 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie42 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie43 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie44 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie45 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie46 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie47 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie48 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie49 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT4_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie41 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie42 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie43 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie44 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie45 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie46 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie47 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie48 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie49 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie410 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie411 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie412 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZombiesTown4RandomMove )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT4Moves )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie41, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie42, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie43, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie44, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie45, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie46, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie47, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie48, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie41, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie42, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie43, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie44, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie45, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie46, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie47, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie48, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie49, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie410, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie411, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie412, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT4 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT4, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT4, Condition( function Trig_ZOT4_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT4, function Trig_ZOT4_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT4Moves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT4Moves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie41, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie42, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie43, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie44, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie45, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie46, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie47, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie48, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie41, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie42, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie43, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie44, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie45, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie46, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie47, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie48, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie49, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie410, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie411, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie412, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT4Moves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT4Moves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT4Moves )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT4Moves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT4Moves, function Trig_ZOT4Moves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT6
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT6_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT6_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT6_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT6_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT6_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 425.00 )
    if ( Trig_ZOT6_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie61 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie62 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie63 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie64 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie65 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie66 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT6_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie61 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie62 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie63 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie64 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie65 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie66 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie67 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie68 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie69 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT6_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie61 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie62 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie63 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie64 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie65 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie66 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie67 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie68 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie69 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie610 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie611 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie612 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZombiesTown2RandomMove )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT6Moves )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie61, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie62, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie63, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie64, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie65, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie66, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie67, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie68, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie69, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie610, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie611, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie612, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie21, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie22, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie23, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie24, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie25, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie26, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie27, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie28, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT6 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT6 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT6, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT6, Condition( function Trig_ZOT6_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT6, function Trig_ZOT6_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT6Moves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT6Moves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie61, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie62, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie63, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie64, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie65, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie66, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie67, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie68, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie69, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie610, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie611, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie612, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie21, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie22, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie23, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie24, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie25, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie26, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie27, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie28, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT6Moves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT6Moves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT6Moves )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT6Moves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT6Moves, function Trig_ZOT6Moves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT7
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT7_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT7_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT7_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT7_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT7_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 475.00 )
    if ( Trig_ZOT7_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie71 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie72 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie73 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie74 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie75 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie76 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT7_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie71 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie72 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie73 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie74 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie75 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie76 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie77 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie78 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie79 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT7_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie71 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie72 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie73 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie74 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie75 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie76 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie77 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie78 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie79 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie710 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie711 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_ZotZombie712 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZombiesTown1RandomMove )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_CinematicZombiesMove )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT7Moves )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie71, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie72, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie73, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie74, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie75, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie76, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie77, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie78, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie79, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie710, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie711, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie712, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie11, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie12, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie13, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie14, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie15, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie16, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie17, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie18, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT7 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT7 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT7, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT7, Condition( function Trig_ZOT7_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT7, function Trig_ZOT7_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT7Moves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT7Moves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie71, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie72, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie73, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie74, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie75, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie76, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie77, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie78, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie79, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie710, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie711, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie712, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie11, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie12, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie13, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie14, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie15, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie16, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie17, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie18, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0023, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0022, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0002, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0004, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT7Moves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT7Moves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT7Moves )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT7Moves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT7Moves, function Trig_ZOT7Moves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT8
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT8_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT8_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT8_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT8_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT8_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 525.00 )
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(0), 'hcth', "TRIGSTR_466", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), null, "TRIGSTR_467", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, true )
    if ( Trig_ZOT8_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie81 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie82 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie83 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie84 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie85 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie86 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT8_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie81 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie82 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie83 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie84 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie85 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie86 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie87 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie88 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie89 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT8_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie81 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie82 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie83 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie84 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie85 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie86 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie87 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie88 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie89 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie810 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie811 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie812 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT8Moves )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie81, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie82, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie83, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie84, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie85, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie86, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie87, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie88, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie89, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie810, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie811, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie812, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT8 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT8 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT8, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT8, Condition( function Trig_ZOT8_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT8, function Trig_ZOT8_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT8Moves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT8Moves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie81, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie82, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie83, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie84, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie85, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie86, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie87, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie88, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie89, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie810, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie811, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie812, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0007, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0008, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0005, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0006, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT8Moves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT8Moves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT8Moves )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT8Moves, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT8Moves, function Trig_ZOT8Moves_Actions )
endfunction
