// Trigger: ZOT5Victory
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT5Victory_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT5Victory_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT5Victory_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT5Victory_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ZOT5Victory_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 575.00 )
    set udg_BoleanLastZombies = true
    if ( Trig_ZOT5Victory_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie51 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie52 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie53 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie54 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie55 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie56 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT5Victory_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie51 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie52 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie53 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie54 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie55 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie56 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie57 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie58 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie59 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ZOT5Victory_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie51 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie52 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie53 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie54 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie55 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie56 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie57 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie58 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie59 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie510 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie511 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombiesOT5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_ZotZombie512 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT5Moves_Victory )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie51, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie52, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie53, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie54, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie55, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie56, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie57, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie58, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie59, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie510, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie511, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie512, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT5Victory takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT5Victory = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_ZOT5Victory, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ZOT5Victory, Condition( function Trig_ZOT5Victory_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT5Victory, function Trig_ZOT5Victory_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZOT5Moves Victory
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZOT5Moves_Victory_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie51, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie52, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie53, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie54, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie55, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie56, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie57, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie58, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie59, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie510, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie511, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_ZotZombie512, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ZOT5Moves_Victory takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ZOT5Moves_Victory = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_ZOT5Moves_Victory )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_ZOT5Moves_Victory, 50.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ZOT5Moves_Victory, function Trig_ZOT5Moves_Victory_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AreaFollow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AreaFollow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call MoveRectToLoc( gg_rct_LightRegion, GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UGLightGroup)) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AreaFollow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AreaFollow = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_AreaFollow )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_AreaFollow, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AreaFollow, function Trig_AreaFollow_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FistPeasant
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FistPeasant_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n002_0025, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FirstPeasant2) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FistPeasant takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FistPeasant = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_FistPeasant, function Trig_FistPeasant_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FistPeasant2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FistPeasant2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n002_0025 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FistPeasant2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( gg_unit_n002_0025, "stop" )
    call GroupImmediateOrderBJ( udg_UGLightGroup, "stop" )
    call CinematicModeBJ( true, GetPlayersAll() )
    call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUTIN, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(9), 'n002', "TRIGSTR_280", GetRectCenter(GetEntireMapRect()), null, "TRIGSTR_281", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, true )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 3.00 )
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(9), 'n002', "TRIGSTR_307", GetRectCenter(GetEntireMapRect()), null, "TRIGSTR_308", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, true )
    call CinematicModeBJ( false, GetPlayersAll() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Optional_Quest_Fisherman )
    call CreateFogModifierRadiusLocBJ( true, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FishermanTakesWeapons), 512 )
    call PingMinimapLocForForce( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FishermanTakesWeapons), 5.00 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 4.00 )
    call FogModifierStop( GetLastCreatedFogModifier() )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n002_0025, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FirstPeasant2) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_309" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_317" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FistPeasant2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FistPeasant2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_FistPeasant2, gg_rct_FirstPeasant1 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_FistPeasant2, Condition( function Trig_FistPeasant2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_FistPeasant2, function Trig_FistPeasant2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FistPeasant3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FistPeasant3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n002_0025 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FistPeasant3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FistPeasant3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FistPeasant3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_FistPeasant3, gg_rct_FirstPeasant2 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_FistPeasant3, Condition( function Trig_FistPeasant3_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_FistPeasant3, function Trig_FistPeasant3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ZombiesTown1RandomMove
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ZombiesTown1RandomMove_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie11, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie12, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie13, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie14, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie15, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie16, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie17, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_TownZombie18, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n006_0032, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_InitialPeasantsRandomMove) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n004_0033, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_InitialPeasantsRandomMove) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n003_0034, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_InitialPeasantsRandomMove) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CinematicZombiesMove
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CinematicZombiesMove_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0023, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0022, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0002, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0004, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0007, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0008, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n008_0005, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n009_0006, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Area1) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CinematicZombiesMove takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CinematicZombiesMove = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_CinematicZombiesMove )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_CinematicZombiesMove, 20.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_CinematicZombiesMove, function Trig_CinematicZombiesMove_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CreateZombiesArea1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie15 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie16 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie15 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie16 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie17 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie18 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreateZombiesArea1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea1, gg_rct_Region03 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea1, Condition( function Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea1, function Trig_CreateZombiesArea1_Actions )
endfunction

// Trigger: CreateZombiesArea2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CreateZombiesArea2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea2_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie21 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie22 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie23 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie24 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea2_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie21 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie22 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie23 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie24 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie25 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie26 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea2_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie21 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie22 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie23 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie24 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie25 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie26 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie27 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie28 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
endfunction

    endif

    endif

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea3_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie31 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie32 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie33 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie34 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea3_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie31 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie32 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )

        set udg_TownZombie33 = GetLastCreatedUnit()

        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )

        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie35 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie36 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea3_Func004C() ) then

        set udg_TownZombie32 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie33 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie34 = GetLastCreatedUnit()

        set udg_TownZombie35 = GetLastCreatedUnit()

        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )

        set udg_TownZombie36 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie37 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )

        set udg_TownZombie38 = GetLastCreatedUnit()

    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea4_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie41 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie42 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie43 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie44 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea4_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie41 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie42 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie43 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie44 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie45 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie46 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea4_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie41 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie42 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie43 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie44 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie45 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie46 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie47 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ZombieArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie48 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreateZombiesArea4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea4 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea4, gg_rct_Region01 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea4, Condition( function Trig_CreateZombiesArea4_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea4, function Trig_CreateZombiesArea4_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CreateZombiesArea5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie51 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie52 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie53 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie54 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie51 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie52 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie53 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie54 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie55 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie56 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie51 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie52 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie53 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie54 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie55 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie56 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie57 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ZombieArea5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveGuardPosition( GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_UGLastZombies )
        set udg_TownZombie58 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreateZombiesArea5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea5 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea5, gg_rct_Region03 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea5, Condition( function Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_CreateZombiesArea5, function Trig_CreateZombiesArea5_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CreatePeasants1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CreatePeasants1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreatePeasants1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n006', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea15 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n006', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea16 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea17 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea18 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea19 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea110 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea111 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreatePeasants1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreatePeasants1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_CreatePeasants1, gg_rct_Region02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_CreatePeasants1, Condition( function Trig_CreatePeasants1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_CreatePeasants1, function Trig_CreatePeasants1_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea21 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n006', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea22 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea23 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea24 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea25 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea26 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea27 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea28 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea29 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea210 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea211 = GetLastCreatedUnit()

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CreatePeasants3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CreatePeasants3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreatePeasants3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea31 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n006', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea32 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea33 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea34 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea35 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea36 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n006', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea37 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea38 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea39 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n006', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea310 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_PeasantsArea3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_VillagerArea311 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreatePeasants3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreatePeasants3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_CreatePeasants3, gg_rct_Region01 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_CreatePeasants3, Condition( function Trig_CreatePeasants3_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_CreatePeasants3, function Trig_CreatePeasants3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CreateFAZombies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CreateFAZombies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateFAZombies_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty1 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateFAZombies_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateFAZombies_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BoleanDificulty3 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreateFAZombies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_ZOT1 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_ZOT2 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_ZOT3 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_ZOT4 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_ZOT5Victory )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAvillager1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n006', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAvillager2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n002', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAvillager3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n003', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAvillager4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_FAVillager = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    if ( Trig_CreateFAZombies_Func012C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie1 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie2 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie3 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie4 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie5 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie6 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie7 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie8 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateFAZombies_Func013C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie1 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie2 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie3 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie4 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie5 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie6 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie7 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie8 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie9), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie9 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie10), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie10 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie11), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CreateFAZombies_Func014C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie1 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie2 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie3 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie4 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie5), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie5 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie6), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie6 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie7), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie7 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie8), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie8 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie9), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie9 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie10), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie10 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie11), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie11 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie12), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie12 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie13), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie13 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', Player(20), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FAzombie14), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_FAZombie14 = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(9), Player(0), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 15.00 )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(9), Player(0), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreateFAZombies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreateFAZombies = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_CreateFAZombies, gg_rct_Region01 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_CreateFAZombies, Condition( function Trig_CreateFAZombies_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_CreateFAZombies, function Trig_CreateFAZombies_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FAVillagerDies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FAVillagerDies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDyingUnit() == udg_FAVillager ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FAVillagerDies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie1, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie2, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie3, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie4, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie5, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie6, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie7, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie8, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie9, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie10, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie11, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie12, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie13, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_FAZombie14, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LightRegion) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FAVillagerDies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FAVillagerDies = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_FAVillagerDies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_FAVillagerDies, Condition( function Trig_FAVillagerDies_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_FAVillagerDies, function Trig_FAVillagerDies_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SheepsRandomMove
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SheepsRandomMove_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nshe_0027, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_sheeps) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nshe_0026, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_sheeps) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nshe_0029, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_sheeps) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nshe_0009, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_sheeps) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SheepsRandomMove takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SheepsRandomMove = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_SheepsRandomMove, 15.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_SheepsRandomMove, function Trig_SheepsRandomMove_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FrogRandomMove1
//===========================================================================

    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0041, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0042, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0037, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog1) )
endfunction

endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0036, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog2) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0031, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog2) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0035, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog2) )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0040, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog3) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nfro_0038, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Frog3) )
